name: Liftandlowerwindowshades
0:
”Alexa, set at all shades to 20 percent”
”Alexa, all shades to 20 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: With the RS Home app, lift and lower your window shades at the level and/or percentage you want them. This skill allows you to set the percentage of how low or high you want all the window shades in your home. To get started, create your RS Home account and then login, connect your shades within the app and then you will be able to fully control them. Say “Alexa set all shades to 20 percent” to set all the shades in the home to 20% of the way down. Or you can say “Alexa all shades up” to move the shades all the way up so they are completely open.
